 Revamp your home or office space with a stunning Vitra Blackout Roast roller blind in a beautiful dark brown colour. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1097 Fabric Colour: Roast Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Flame Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Flame Electric Roller Blind in Red. Made to measure from £140.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
